column1: On a small colbled path leading precisely nowhere you can see a small cottage
The cottage has a red roof and chimney spouting rhythmic pufs of smoke
You walk through door and are wellcomed by the sound of an entrence bell and a slight wherring
The engine sound is coming from behind a door labeled 'core'
Above the door is a clock which makes it's presence known by the irritatingly acrurate ticking
The room it's self is comfortably full and compleatly wooden
To the left of the room there are two hallways the first is labeled L1 the second is L2
On the right side of the room the third hallway L3
column2: at this point the shop keeper walks in

column1: The first thing you notice is her pink hair
column2: and while ceeping an eye on the clock she stands behind her desk
